channel.title: Paramount Skydance on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Paramount Skydance on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: David Ellison’s High Wire Act
item.description: The ambitious Oracle heir, who once counted Steve Jobs as a mentor, hopes to turn Paramount Skydance into a tech-era media monolith. But does he have the team — or the vision — to scale that mountain?

item.title: David Ellison’s High Wire Act
item.description: The ambitious Oracle heir, who once counted Steve Jobs as a mentor, hopes to turn Paramount Skydance into a tech-era media monolith. But does he have the team — or the vision — to scale that mountain?

item.title: Paramount Rounds Out Its Executive Ranks Under David Ellison
item.description: Jeff Shell, George Cheeks, Cindy Holland, Josh Greenstein and Dana Goldberg will have some help when the Skydance deal closes.

item.title: How the Trump FCC justified requiring a “bias monitor” at CBS
item.description: Trump FCC claims there’s precedent for CBS ombudsman, but it’s a weak one.
